name: Dinakar S. Murthy
summary: Experienced Lead Marketing Data Analyst with expertise in data-driven marketing research, statistical analysis, and machine learning. Skilled in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools, with a strong academic background in Business Analytics and Computer Science.

education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Business Analytics
Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.title: Lead Marketing Data Analyst
experience.description: Boosted search engine marketing (SEM) conversion rates by 40% through keyword analysis, trend identification, and strategy optimization. Led data-driven marketing research with custom KPIs and visualization for enhanced decision-making on digital platforms.

experience.title: Data Research Assistant
experience.description: Developed innovative sales prediction model for digital startups by leveraging advanced statistical analysis techniques. Addressed industry-specific needs by identifying gaps in existing models.

experience.title: Lead Data Analyst
experience.description: Developed a social welfare web application with Django, Python, SQL, Folium, and Google Maps API to enhance user experience. Improved project efficiency as Project Manager by applying best practices in data analysis and technology integration.

projects.name: Predictive Sales Analysis
projects.description: Quantified impact of marketing interventions on customer acquisition. Created visualizations to illustrate trends and relationships between marketing spend, customer growth, and sales.

projects.name: Workforce Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed HR datasets to build predictive models for turnover drivers. Implemented retention strategies based on findings to reduce turnover and enhance employee engagement.

projects.name: AI Chat Bot
projects.description: Built a real-time chatbot application with MERN stack, integrating NLP for message processing. Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development and responsive UI design.

projects.name: Healthcare Workforce Analysis
projects.description: Performed data cleaning and visualization of nurse staffing data to optimize schedules and reduce costs. Provided data-driven recommendations for improved patient outcomes.

projects.name: SEM Dashboard
projects.description: Developed interactive visualizations for analyzing SEM trends and providing actionable insights for campaign adjustments.

projects.name: United States Demographic Analysis
projects.description: Built and fine-tuned machine learning models to predict income levels with improved accuracy.
